abstract: Vasek Pospisil defeats Yen-Hsun Lu to advance to Atlanta Open tennis tournament quarterfinals; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pospisil, the No. 2 seed, beat Lu, 6-4, 6-7 (3), 6-4, with the match ending on Lu’s second double-fault of the match.

headline.main: Vasek Pospisil Beats Heat and Yen-Hsun Lu

snippet: Pospisil, the No. 2 seed, beat Lu, 6-4, 6-7 (3), 6-4, with the match ending on Lu’s second double-fault of the match.
